name: Homeplenish™
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Homeplenish users can use this skill with the Homeplenish app to setup auto re-ordering for their toilet paper and paper towel devices. Account linking is required. For the best experience, the Homeplenish mobile app should be used to link your account.
